name: Luxy Charms
powerTags: You don’t get to dull my sparkle
bio: Luxy Charms embodies the heart of the queer community’s resilience — the sparkle that never fades, even under pressure. Through compassion, performance, and power, he leads with empathy and strength, protecting his chosen family while daring the world to shine brighter.
notes: Luxy has mastered turning vulnerability into power. His strength comes from surviving hardship and finding family in his community. His connection to the Rainbow and Anchor themes allows him to channel both flamboyant energy and grounded loyalty.
